TOOLTIPS.COMBINED_NAME: Business Name or Name of the Parameter

TOOLTIPS.EQUAL: Comparison of value and imported value
TOOLTIPS.EQUAL.TRUE: Value and imported value are equal
TOOLTIPS.EQUAL.FALSE: Value and imported value are not equal
